name: The Clean Up
description:
A 3D isometric top-down simulation game where players play as an experienced thief that poses as a house cleaner, cleaning for high-end clientele but also robbing them at the same time. Players will have to juggle between cleaning the house in order to maintain your cover as a cleaner all the while searching it for valuables and stealing them. Go from one house to another, cleaning up their messes while stealing their Main Valuable and whatever other valuables that you can get your hands on, all before your time runs out.
